Review.Titre: we use your software because of the…it was a concurrent model
Review.Contenu: we use your software because of the concurrent user license model. Since you are no longer supporting that model we are forced to look for alternatives.

Review.Titre: You are the worst software supplier
Review.Contenu: You are the worst software supplier. Longer time for enterprise purchase or companies which work with purchase orders. They provide you a Subscription ID to renew the license, but they don't know what that is and if you ask then they never respond. So disappointed with the service.
Our company was forced to "upgrade" to single point licenses from floating licenses. This resulted increased cost and 70% of our users access being removed.

The only reason why I use Minitab is because it is the standard to create histograms and SPC charts in the aerospace industry. If not, I would not use Minitab. It is an expensive software that doesn't do anything that could not otherwise be done with open source alternatives.
The Minitab licensing is confusing. There has never been a time when I did not have to contact Minitab to access their software.

Review.Titre: Your local team is poorly informed…
Review.Contenu: Your local team is poorly informed about your own product

Review.Titre: I was forced to pay for additional licences on renewal
Review.Contenu: I was forced to pay for additional licences I did not require because if I dropped from 10 concurrent licenses to 6, apparently I would be pushed into the user-named licence system which would cost even more. I do not know yet how we will manage next years  licences going forward if we are pushed to the user-named licence package the cost will spiral and not be value for money.

The 'older' versions of minitab had a imbedded tutorial, so that if you were doing something new, or something you hadn't done in a while, you could just run through the tutorial, and do the analysis that you wanted. Was very VERY helpful and useful, but for some reason it has been taken away in the current release.

4 big modules Missing 3 big modules,it is different with promotion content，currently,only can access foundation of data analysis,missing statistics quality analysis,De sign of experiments,productive analytics.

Review.Titre: I wish minitab had more programming…
Review.Contenu: I wish minitab had more programming capabilities. I find myself doing too much clicking!

Review.Titre: Excellent software with an extensive array of modules and an easy user interface.
Review.Contenu: Excellent software with an extensive array of modules and a very easy user interface.Would have been a 5 star if it wasn't for the price. The annual single users licence is expensive for smaller Companies.

Review.Titre: Practical issues using MINITAB in an certified environment
Review.Contenu: 1. Analysis functions are requiring special design of the data in a precise format - the format is too unflecible and differs significantly with the practical data-generation / data-acquisition.2. The used mathematics of the functions is not explained in a way to reproduce them. => This creates mistrust from external customers/auditors - this is not a question of correctness but of transparency.

Review.Titre: Minitab Education hub is difficult to…
Review.Contenu: Minitab Education hub is difficult to navigate and not user friendly setting it up

Review.Titre: switch from OnPrem to Named User
Review.Contenu: We had to switch from OnPrem to Named User. Costs increased.

The migration to the cloud license version of the application was great. It took a little longer than it should have for SSO migration, but once someone got in touch with us, SSO was working as intended.

Thorough 1- pass through the material.   We went through all the material once so we know the buttons exist.  Due to time constraints you don't get any repetition, so if you don't get it stuck in your head the first time, you are going hunting.

Review.Titre: The cost of Minitab is very prohibitive for Consultants…
Review.Contenu: The cost of Minitab is very prohibitive for consultants who use your product with clients (at $1,000/yr). The irony is that as we promote the use of the SW we are require pay to do use it.  At one point in the past, Minitab would provide the SW at no charge.

Review.Titre: Come prepared and read the modules before hand
Review.Contenu: The teacher was very patient and helpful. Answered all the questions on the spot.

Review.Titre: the program can be reporting output…
Review.Contenu: the program can be reporting output easily links predictive analysis, CART.it would be great to support training by local language to deep understand and utilize program full functions.

Review.Titre: I'd started using Minitab a while back…
Review.Contenu: I'd started using Minitab a while back and found it is very useful in my day to day working. One of the major thing which I like is that help is there for each tools and I was able to understand how to use that tool.
Becsuse i am honest helpful, diligent of all the task imade it all done .

Review.Titre: Fast reaction time and good final solution
Review.Contenu: Fast reaction time and good final solution. The only drawbacks were on the difficulty to change the address on the offer to match the one of our signature!

Review.Titre: IT was easy to work with your sales…
Review.Contenu: IT was easy to work with your sales person, Christine and support with Scott.  Minitab is just expensive for out 2 departments.

Review.Titre: It is an amazing experience and I hope…
Review.Contenu: It is an amazing experience and I hope to be able to perform different operations on data from the organization’s processes and standards to connect with the support of the system.

I purchased the Predictive Analytics Add-on. It was quite complicated to add the license to our existing enterprise license. However, your support - Sangiethan Sathiyanathan - was very competent and helpful and solved the issue quickly. Many thanks!
I have used Minitab in several Companies when analyzing process capability and variation but I have couples of years when I used it last time.

Review.Titre: Updations in graphs and options are good
Essentials and SQA Training was very…
Review.Contenu: Essentials and SQA Training was very good
easy to manage licenses over the minitab license portal
Good explanation, good information with many details about the specific tools that could be use for statistical analysis.
Good support
Improve visualization and reporting feature
competent support, but actually the setup process for minitab and additional modules is a bit weird - without help a correct setup was not possible for me. N.B. I am Minitab user since 1997...

The training was really good and the content was sufficient to fill the agenda, the trainer was fabulous, he could keep the whole class's attention to the full training, his methods to teach and how to interact with the class was perfect, he turned a statistical training and a memorable experience.

Review.Titre: Great training on minitab and basic statistics
Review.Contenu: Jose was a great teacher, explaining things clearly and moving at a pace that kept our group together! And industry examples were helpful to visualize how we would utilize these skills. I also appreciated the ability to perform the functions in parallel,
The best stats package, I used while doing master black belt projects.  Easy to use, great help materials, works well with MS office.  Though quite expensive

Great Service!  Cody and Kristin were attentive and promptly answered our questions as we navigated our (internal) purchasing maze. Now that we're implementing, Jose has been right there to assist! and using the web portal to manage licenses is BRILLIANT.  well done!

Review.Titre: Joe has great knowledge and passion
Review.Contenu: Joe has great knowledge and passion. Sad to admit but after working 5 years as process engineer I finally understand correctly capability analysis.

Customer Service in the Sales team is very responsive and clear. Disappointed only by not receiving the educational licensing for students. Our usurers are students attending a Lean Six Sigma black belt course with the government. Our desire was for them to have an education license they could use for a year to determine the value outside the academic environment and renew if the value was there...
Very easy to work with.  The sales team and account manager responded to emails promptly and thoroughly.  Their communication was clear and they stayed on top of deadlines.

Review.Titre: Once I got to the right person in person in Minitab!
Review.Contenu: Once I got to the right person in Minitab to describe my situation and what I needed, the response was timely - both effective and efficient.  Getting to the right person to explain my situation was not immediate.  The online search was not helpful for my situation.

Review.Titre: Mr Salim has pace himself exceptional…
Review.Contenu: Mr Salim has pace himself exceptional well to ensure all participants follows and understand the topics very well.  Thank you Mr Salim.
I was asked to generate a time series with numerous data point/day.  The excel graph as not very helpful, but MiniTab generated the graph perfectly.

Casey was an excellent instructor!  He was able to communicate challenging material, and make it interesting with the data sets that were provided.  He also added to the course with specific requests from our group that weren't originally going to be covered.

The purchase experience went very smoothly.  My company sent a PO to Minitab and the next day I had my license information and was able to quickly install the latest version and access the Education Hub
Quick to respond with quote and change in contact person. Sent emails with all the relevant details required in respect of our order and renewal
The training was well structured and planned. The trainer went over the details at good pace and with examples which gave more clarity to the topic.
So easy to setup, create and assign users, helpful videos so we can access without any help. Such a nice experience!

Review.Titre: I feel that I am basically satisfied…
Review.Contenu: I feel that I am basically satisfied with the use process. I applied for a reward before, but you didn't send it to me. 😞The wool has not been picked up.

Review.Titre: Outstanding Factorial and Response Surface Designs Class
Review.Contenu: The Minitab instructor, Casey, did a great job presenting the Factorial Designs and Response Surface Designs class. The material and data files were organized really well and Casey did a fantastic job presenting some (relatively) complex subjects. I look forward to attending more virtual events.
Download and activation processes were easy and quick. Interactions with sales staff were low pressure.

My experience was very good , because I had the opportunity to go deeper inside the the arguments already seen in past courses session and the trainer was very good, because given several practical exercises to better understand the concepts.
The coach was on the top of its task, it was pleasure to participate in a training session lead with such a passion
MARS IS GREAT WAY TO FINALLY PRODUCE EQUATION OUT OF THE DATA.

Review.Titre: I have used this software at several…
Review.Contenu: I have used this software at several other companies & I find it fairly easy to use and gives a very professional look to reports.
Casey Rogers was very knowledgeable, gave great examples and was willing to help during breaks.

Review.Titre: This application really helps us to…
Review.Contenu: This application really helps us to simplify the data analysis process, its use is also easy to understand, very user friendly

Review.Contenu: Positive attitudeQuick response Help - SupportCustomer focus

Review.Contenu: The way the Presenters both Minitab & Other Customers gave a full description of how they have used the MInitab Software in various different industries.
Training was great. Jose did a great job answering questions and getting the trainees engaged.
Fantastic software, links to the help menu and methods and formulas is excellent.

Review.Titre: I learned more through this class than…
Review.Contenu: I learned more through this class than trying to learn it on my own.  I look forward to the "Quality" tools part of this training
It was a great training with a lot of praxis content.Great trainer.
I appreciated the promptness and flexibility and also the easiness with which updates can be made.
I appreciate the quick and straight to the point response from the Minitab team.

Very detailed!
Casey was an excellent instructor.  He adapted the class well to the virtual teaching environment.

Review.Contenu: I would like to give a high five to Dana for making this process so easy.
Awesome sales staff, customer support, and products.
fully satisfied with services
